name: Stacky Jump!
description:
How far can you climb?

Probably best stack jump game on iOS!

- Jump on the stack of blocks and build the highest tower imaginable
- Improve your high score in endless mode
- Complete the 48 challenges
- Unlock all 39 characters from 10 unique worlds

Stacky is a simple, exciting arcade game where with just a simple tap you make your character jump. You need to have good timing though, as blocks arrive with varied speeds. Master the game by training your reflex to create combos with extra score points. Every time you play, you gain more progress to unlock new creatures and worlds with different background and stack graphics. You can switch them as you please. One day you can jump in the Aztec Jungle, the other it can be even in the Stone Age! Compete with your friends on the leaderboards an see who is the best Stacky jumper.
